title: To his reverend and much respected good friend, Mr. John Goodwin: be these I pray presented.
author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
notes: Includes: Taylor, Daniel.  To his much respected friend Mr. Iohn Vicars [signed on page 8: D.T.].
Annotation on Thomason copy: on page 1: "feb: 11th 1644"; on page 8: "Dan: Taylor".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
